document.full_text: thai authorities have arrested and charged a u.s. citizen with insulting the country's revered monarchy, the latest of a growing number of people accused of breaching the world's toughest lese-majeste laws.
document.title: u.s. citizen charged with thai royal insult
lines_and_colors: thai authorities have arrested and charged a u.s. citizen with insulting the country's revered monarchy, the latest of a growing number of people accused of breaching the world's toughest lese-majeste laws.
